title: Alex Henery from Basement
itunes:title: Alex Henery from Basement
description:
One afternoon Alex and I got together and chatted about his time in Basement and the formation of the band, how he tries to capture a "feeling" with his music video work and how religion plays a central part in his life. It was quite a pleasure and I hope you find it entertaining as well. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
